name: CUSTOMVideo Grid Socials #2
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>
{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign sub_heading = section.settings.sub_heading
  assign sub_heading_size = section.settings.sub_heading_size
  assign sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign sub_heading_color = section.settings.sub_heading_color
  assign sub_heading_custom = section.settings.sub_heading_custom
  assign sub_heading_font = section.settings.sub_heading_font
  assign sub_heading_height = section.settings.sub_heading_height
  assign sub_heading_align = section.settings.sub_heading_align
  assign sub_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_align_mobile
  assign sub_heading_mt = section.settings.sub_heading_mt

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt

  assign size = slider_view | modulo: 2
  assign size_tablet = slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 | modulo: 2

  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color

  assign video_radius = section.settings.video_radius
  assign video_border_thickness = section.settings.video_border_thickness
  assign video_border_color = section.settings.video_border_color
  assign video_ratio = section.settings.video_ratio
  assign video_ratio_mobile = section.settings.video_ratio_mobile
  assign radius_top = section.settings.radius_top
  assign border_bottom = section.settings.border_bottom

  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_radius = section.settings.content_radius
  assign content_border_thickness = section.settings.content_border_thickness
  assign content_border_color = section.settings.content_border_color
  assign content_bg_color = section.settings.content_bg_color

  assign info_size = section.settings.info_size
  assign info_size_mobile = section.settings.info_size_mobile
  assign info_custom = section.settings.info_custom
  assign info_font = section.settings.info_font
  assign info_height = section.settings.info_height
  assign info_align_mobile = section.settings.info_align_mobile
  assign info_align = section.settings.info_align

  assign action_size_mobile = section.settings.action_size_mobile
  assign action_size = section.settings.action_size
  assign action_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.action_icon_size_mobile
  assign action_icon_size = section.settings.action_icon_size
  assign action_border_thickness = section.settings.action_border_thickness
  assign action_border_color = section.settings.action_border_color
  assign action_border_hover_color = section.settings.action_border_hover_color
  assign action_bg_color = section.settings.action_bg_color
  assign action_bg_hover_color = section.settings.action_bg_hover_color
  assign action_icon_color = section.settings.action_icon_color
  assign action_icon_hover_color = section.settings.action_icon_hover_color
  assign action_position_mobile = section.settings.action_position_mobile
  assign action_position = section.settings.action_position
  assign hide_action = section.settings.hide_action

  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt
  assign navigation_gap_mobile = section.settings.navigation_gap_mobile
  assign navigation_gap = section.settings.navigation_gap

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign pagination_size = section.settings.pagination_size
  assign pagination_size_mobile = section.settings.pagination_size_mobile
  assign pagination_custom = section.settings.pagination_custom
  assign pagination_font = section.settings.pagination_font
  assign pagination_height = section.settings.pagination_height
  assign pagination_color = section.settings.pagination_color
  assign pagination_show_desktop = section.settings.pagination_show_desktop
  assign pagination_show_mobile = section.settings.pagination_show_mobile
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ info_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ pagination_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ sub_heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ sub_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: visible !important;
  }

  .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important; 
    height: auto !important;
    text-decoration: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    transform: scale(0.8) !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ video_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }

  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .video-social-content-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ content_radius }}px;
    border: {{ content_border_thickness }}px solid {{ content_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ content_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    position: relative;
  }

  .video-social-info-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    text-align: {{ info_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ info_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ info_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    width: {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ action_bg_color }};
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ action_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
    fill: {{ action_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  video-social-action-{{ section.id }}:hover svg {
    fill: {{ action_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} .video-social-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-social-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .video-social-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-social-mute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ navigation_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: {{ navigation_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px !important
  }

  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px !important
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: center;
    gap: 8px;
  }

  .video-social-line-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    margin: 0px;
    width: 46px;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: {{ pagination_color }};
    vertical-align: baseline;
  }

  .video-social-current-{{ section.id }},
  .video-social-all-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ pagination_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ pagination_color }}px;
    line-height: {{ pagination_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ sub_heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ sub_heading_align }};
    }

    .video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    .video-social-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-social-info-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ info_align }};
      font-size: {{ info_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ action_size }}px;
      height: {{ action_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px;
    }

    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .video-social-current-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-all-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ pagination_size }}px;
    }
    
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if info_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-info-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ info_font.family }}, {{ info_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ info_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ info_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-current-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-all-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ pagination_font.family }}, {{ pagination_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ pagination_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ pagination_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if border_bottom %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
      border-bottom: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
      border: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if radius_top %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} video,
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
      border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
      border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-video-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
    
    .video-social-right-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px {{ arrow_size_mobile | plus: 10 }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile == false and pagination_show_mobile == false %}
  <style>
    .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show == false and pagination_show == false %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if action_position_mobile == "top_left" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
      top: 20px;
      left: 20px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif action_position_mobile == "top_right" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
      top: 20px;
      right: 20px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif action_position_mobile == "bottom_left" %}
  <style>
    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
      bottom: 20px;
      left: 20px;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
      bottom: 20px;
      right: 20px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if action_position == "top_left" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px){
       .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
        top: 20px;
        left: 20px;
        right: unset;
        bottom: unset;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif action_position == "top_right" %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px){
      .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
        top: 20px;
        right: 20px;
        left: unset;
        bottom: unset;
      }
     }
  </style>
{% elsif action_position == "bottom_left" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px){
      .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
        bottom: 20px;
        left: 20px;
        top: unset;
        right: unset;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px){
      .video-social-action-{{ section.id }} {
        bottom: 20px;
        right: 20px;
        top: unset;
        left: unset;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %}PREVIEW{% endcomment %}
<style>
  <style>
  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
    gap: {{ slider_gap }}px;
  }

  .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
   .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(20% - {{ slider_gap }}px);
    }
  
    .video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .video-social-card-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 
  }
</style>

{% if size_tablet != 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: scale(0.8) !important;
      }
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
        transform: scale(1) !important;
        transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if size != 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: scale(0.8) !important;
      }
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
        transform: scale(1) !important;
        transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }} {
        transform: scale(1) !important;
      }
      .video-social-card-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
        transform: scale(1) !important;
        transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} video-social-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">

      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="video-social-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      {% if sub_heading != blank %}
        <div class="video-social-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ sub_heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      <div class="video-social-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper preview">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <div class="video-social-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
              <div class="video-social-video-{{ section.id }}">
                {% assign video_id =  block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                  
                  {% if block.settings.loop %}
                    {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                  {% endif %}
    
                  {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                    {% assign autoplay = '&mute=1&autoplay=1' %}
                  {% endif %}

                  {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                    {% assign autoplay_2 = '&autoplay=1' %}
                  {% endif %}
                  
                  {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                    <iframe
                      {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                      data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay_2 }}{{ loop }}"
                      data-src2 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ loop }}"
                      data-src3 = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                      class="lazy"
                      allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                      allowfullscreen
                      title="Fixed Video"
                      {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}
                    ></iframe>
                  {%- else -%}
                    <iframe
                      {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                      data-src1="ttps://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay_2 }}{{ loop }}"
                      data-src2 = "ttps://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ loop }}"
                      data-src3 = "ttps://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1{{ autoplay }}{{ loop }}"
                      class="lazy"
                      allow="autoplay; encrypted-media"
                      allowfullscreen
                      title="Fixed Video"
                      {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}
                    ></iframe>
                  {% endif %}
                {% else %}
                  
                  <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" {% if block.settings.autoplay %}autoplay{% endif %} muted {% if block.settings.controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if block.settings.poster != blank %}poster="{{ block.settings.poster | image_url }}"{% endif %} playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy" disablepictureinpicture></video>
                
                {% endif %}
            
                {% unless hide_action %}
                  <div class="video-social-action-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg class="video-social-mute-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path><path d="M5.889 16H2a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V9a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3.889l5.294-4.332a.5.5 0 0 1 .817.387v15.89a.5.5 0 0 1-.817.387L5.89 16zm14.525-4l3.536 3.536-1.414 1.414L19 13.414l-3.536 3.536-1.414-1.414L17.586 12 14.05 8.464l1.414-1.414L19 10.586l3.536-3.536 1.414 1.414L20.414 12z"></path></svg>  
                    <svg class="video-social-unmute-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path><path d="M5.889 16H2a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V9a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3.889l5.294-4.332a.5.5 0 0 1 .817.387v15.89a.5.5 0 0 1-.817.387L5.89 16zm13.517 4.134l-1.416-1.416A8.978 8.978 0 0 0 21 12a8.982 8.982 0 0 0-3.304-6.968l1.42-1.42A10.976 10.976 0 0 1 23 12c0 3.223-1.386 6.122-3.594 8.134zm-3.543-3.543l-1.422-1.422A3.993 3.993 0 0 0 16 12c0-1.43-.75-2.685-1.88-3.392l1.439-1.439A5.991 5.991 0 0 1 18 12c0 1.842-.83 3.49-2.137 4.591z"></path></svg>
                  </div>
                {% endunless %}
              </div>
              <div class="video-social-content-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.info != blank %}
                  <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}p{% endif %} class="video-social-info-{{ section.id }}" style="color: {{ block.settings.info_color }};">{{ block.settings.info }}</{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}p{% endif %}>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="video-social-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
               width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
               xml:space="preserve">
              <path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
                  l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
                  c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
                  C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
            
            </svg>
          </button>
          <div class="video-social-pagination-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="video-social-current-{{ section.id }}">1</span>
            <span class="video-social-line-{{ section.id }}"></span>
            <span class="video-social-all-{{ section.id }}">{{ section.blocks.size }}</span>
          </div>      
          <button class="video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
               width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
               xml:space="preserve">
              <path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
                  l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
                  c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
                  C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
            
            </svg>
          </button>
      </div>
      
    </div>
</div>
                
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8.4.7/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
{% if lazy %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}

<script>
  function initVideoFromSocial2() {
    document.querySelector('.video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper('.video-social-slider-{{ section.id }}', {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.video-social-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.video-social-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          centeredSlides: true,
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }}
        },
        768: {
          centeredSlides: {% if size_tablet == 0 %}false{% else %}true{% endif %},
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}
        },
        1024: {
          centeredSlides: {% if size == 0 %}false{% else %}true{% endif %},
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }}
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          const slides = this.slides;
          let slidesIndex = this.realIndex;
          slidesIndex++;
      
          if (document.querySelector('.video-social-current-{{ section.id }}')) {
            document.querySelector('.video-social-current-{{ section.id }}').innerText = slidesIndex;
          }
    
          for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            let video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
            let frame = slides[i].querySelector('iframe');
            let btn = slides[i].querySelector('.video-social-action-{{ section.id }}');
            let src3;
            let src2;
            let src1;
            if(frame) {
              src3 = frame.getAttribute('data-src3');
              src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
              src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
            }
    
            if (i === this.activeIndex) {
              if (video) {
                video.play();
              }

              if(btn) {
                if(btn.classList.contains('active')) {
                  if(frame) {
                    frame.src = src1;
                  }
                } else {
                  if(frame) {
                    frame.src = src3;
                  }
                }
              } else {
                if(frame) {
                  frame.src = src3;
                }
              }
            } else {
              if (video) {
                video.pause();
              }

              if(frame) {
                frame.src = src2;
              }
            }
          }
        },
      },
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.video-social-card-{{ section.id }}').forEach(el => {
      let btn = el.querySelector('.video-social-action-{{ section.id }}');
      let frame = el.querySelector('iframe');
      let src;
      if(frame) {
        src = frame.getAttribute("data-src1");
      }
      let video = el.querySelector('video');
      if(btn) {
         btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
          btn.classList.toggle('active');
          if(btn.classList.contains('active')) {
            if(frame) {
              frame.src = src;
            }
            if(video) {
              video.muted = false;
              video.setAttribute("mute", "false"); 
            }
          } else {
            if(frame) {
              frame.src += "&mute=1";
            }
            if(video) {
              video.muted = true;
              video.setAttribute("mute", "true"); 
            }
          }
        }) 
      }
    })
    
    var ssVideoElements = document.querySelectorAll('.section-{{ section.id }} video');
    ssVideoElements .forEach(function(ssVideo) {
      ssVideo.setAttribute('controlsList', 'nodownload');
    });

    {% if lazy %}
      var lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

      window.addEventListener( "LazyLoad::Initialized", function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },false);
    {% endif %}
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initVideoFromSocial2);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initVideoFromSocial2);
  }
</script>

heading.default: Recommended by the best of the best
heading.label: Heading

sub_heading.default: Approved by a team of health, wellness, and sports nutrition professionals.
sub_heading.label: Sub-Heading

slider_view.label: Slider Per View
slider_view.description: Use uneven number to highlight middle slide

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load media for speed optimisation
